page_analysis.text_content:
Light well & stairwell standards
& site planning

• Such features may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard.

• Maximum width (interior dimension) is 3'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter.

• Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max (however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line).

• Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features or portions of features that encroach into the required yards, on all sides of the structure, may not exceed 15'.

• Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees.

• Public Works Department must approve drainage system.

Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

Interior lot example
Rear yard

Buildable area
3' max width

Main dwelling

3' max. width

3' min. from lot line (Typ.)
3' max. into side yard (Typ.)
Front yard

Key
—— Curb
—— Lot line
[patterned] Sidewalk
- - - - Required setbacks
[box dashed] Buildable area
[solid gray] Dwelling
Lightwells & stairwells
[white box] Lightwells & stairwells that encroach into the rec yards

Lightwells & stairwells
• a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15'
• a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of the perimeter of the basement

Note: measurments are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure.

visual_elements.description: Site plan example labeled 'Interior lot example' showing a rectangular buildable area with a main dwelling inside. The diagram includes labeled dimensions for light wells and stairwells: '3' max width' on two sides, '3' min. from lot line (Typ.)', '3' max. into side yard (Typ.)'. The diagram uses different line styles and shading to indicate curb, lot line, sidewalk, required setbacks, buildable area, dwelling, and lightwells & stairwells. A key explains these symbols and patterns. The diagram visually represents the spatial relationship and allowable encroachments of light wells and stairwells relative to the lot lines and yards.

technical_specifications.parameter: Combined length of all excavated features (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure)
Allowable encroachment into required side yard
Minimum distance from side lot line for encroachment
Allowable encroachment into required rear yard
Combined length of all excavated features or portions encroaching into required yards (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure)
Sum of encroaching features a + b
Sum of all features a + b + c + d

structural_elements.main_heading: Light well & stairwell standards & site planning

additional_notes: Measurements are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure.
No handwritten notes, stamps, or markings detected.
Page number 42 at bottom left corner.
cross_references: Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

qualifiers.text: Such features may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard.
Measurements are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure.
Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees.
Public Works Department must approve drainage system.

conditions.text: The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter.
Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max (however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line).
Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'.

The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features or portions of features that encroach into the required yards, on all sides of the structure, may not exceed 15'.
a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15'.
a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of the perimeter of the basement.

logical_relationships.expression: a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15' AND a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of the perimeter of the basement
If allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max, then feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line

execution_sequence.action: Verify maximum width (interior dimension) does not exceed 3 feet
Check combined length of all excavated features does not exceed 30% of basement perimeter
Confirm allowable encroachment into required side yard is maximum 3 feet and feature is minimum 3 feet from side lot line
Confirm allowable encroachment into required rear yard is maximum 4 feet
Ensure combined length of excavated features or portions encroaching into required yards does not exceed 15 feet
Verify sum of encroaching features a + b does not exceed 15 feet
Verify sum of all features a + b + c + d does not exceed 30% of basement perimeter
Confirm excavated features are not harmful to neighboring trees
Obtain Public Works Department approval for drainage system
